useCase.name: Specify Remote Replication Policy for a Collection

mainSequence.step: Repository Manager accesses Replication Policy Settings.
EDRMS Interface retrieves Current Policy Settings.
Replication Policy Module queries Existing Policies.
Replication Policy Module shows Current Policies.
Repository Manager defines/updates Policy for Collection.
Replication Policy Module updates Policy in DB.
Remote Storage Service initiates Policy Replication Update.
Remote Storage Service acknowledges Replication Policy Update.
Replication Policy Module confirms Policy Update.
